code.p1: This single web page was developed using angular8, html5, scss.
code.p2: This project is just a simple including the architecture, the design, the content, the code writing and the app deployment.
code.p3: I tried in this project to use the maximum tools offered by angular ( use of smart and dump component, service, module, interface, routing, data binding, httpClient get and post request, and more).
code.p4: For deployement, I used firebase (also used for storage and database).
